item.title: San Francisco Sees Nancy Pelosi as a Tireless Leader for the City
item.description: Representative Nancy Pelosi, after announcing her retirement, was praised by many San Franciscans for her tireless efforts on behalf of the city. Some...

item.title: More Democrats Need to Follow Pelosi’s Example and Retire
item.description: She has shown herself more willing than most to put aside her own ego for the greater good.

item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Scar Canadian City Where Cars Have Been Made for Decades
item.description: An automaker’s decision to shift Canadian jobs to the United States has left workers in Brampton, Ontario, feeling betrayed and angry.
